text.div:
CARIN RTPBC Error Code System

This code system defines the error codes to be used by real-time pharmacy benefit check servers when encountering an error that prevents processing from completing.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/carin/CodeSystem/rtpbc-error-code defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
no-patient-match No patient match foundNo patient match found
multiple-patient-matches More Than One Patient FoundMore Than One Patient Found
invalid-product-id M/I Product/Service IDM/I Product/Service ID

name: CarinRtpbcErrorCodeSystem
title: CARIN RTPBC Error Code System
description: This code system defines the error codes to be used by real-time pharmacy benefit check servers when encountering an error that prevents processing from completing.
